title: Obama's U.N. Speech Aims To Enlist Others In Fight Against ISIS
teaser: President Obama addresses the U.N. General Assembly Wednesday morning about the threat posed by the Islamic State, also known as ISIS, and then in the afternoon, he hosts a meeting of the Security Counsel. World leaders will debate a resolution aimed at stemming the flow of foreign fighters to and from Syria.
